thread.title: Crazy girl flips out after guy agrees they should be friends (6 Photos)
thread.title_full: Crazy girl flips out after guy agrees they should be friends (6 Photos)

author: Travis
title: Crazy girl flips out after guy agrees they should be friends (6 Photos)
text:
Reddit 
It’s safe to say everyone hates being rejected. Some people can handle being rejected better than others. Whether it’s going out and having a good night with friends or staying and binge watching romantic comedies. On the other hand, some people just can’t handle the thought of rejection. That’s where this batshit crazy girl comes in. 
After having an average first date, Reddit user ToastedCookieOats , received a text that the girl just wanted to be friends. He agreed and that’s when things took a turn to crazy town. 2
